statements: DELETE FROM file_versions WHERE author_id = 5 AND version_number < 3;
DELETE FROM file_versions WHERE file_id = 100 AND version_number = 1;
DELETE FROM file_versions WHERE author_id = 500 AND revision_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM file_revisions WHERE version_id = 10 AND revision_number > 5;
DELETE FROM file_revisions WHERE editor = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM file_revisions WHERE editor = 'John Doe' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM Version WHERE file_id = 2 AND version_number < 5;
